unnormalised: Hey, great initiative! Solar rooftop subsidies can be a game changer, especially for families in cities like Bangalore. Rs. 50,000 subsidy could really help middle-class folks switch. Imagine all those rooftops generating power! Maybe we can use some of that energy for lighting up the streets during Diwali. Just hope the paperwork isn't too much like applying for a PAN card! Imagine having biryani made with solar powered electricity during Onam! That's the future I want.
